author: Anthony Schmidt
description: Gin-laced Cucumber and elderflower with a splash of freshening lemon juice and enlivened with soda. Perfect for a summer afternoon.
name: Easy Street
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker
Add next 4 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda
